        public java.util.List<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean>> getSortFields()
        Description copied from interface: QueryRequestInfo
        Gets the sort fields. Its a ordered list. For a sort field [{"subject", true},{"added", false}] like this would sort UGC based on subject in ascending order and then by create date
